steps.title: Selecting a Problem
steps.content: Click on any problem number in the grid to load it. For beginners, we recommend starting with Problem 1.

steps.title: Understanding the Problem
steps.content: Read the problem description carefully. Make sure you understand what is being asked before writing code.

steps.title: Writing Your Solution
steps.content: Use the code editor to write your solution. The editor provides syntax highlighting and auto-completion.
